description.value:
Fear

Aura 5

Any enemy within the aura takes a -2 penalty to saving throws.

Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

Reach 3

+24 vs AC; 2d10+7 damage, and the target is immobilized and takes ongoing 5 damage (save ends both).

Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

Reach 3

+24 vs AC; 1d10+7 damage, and the target takes ongoing 5 damage (save ends).

At-Will

Standard

The dragon makes a claw attack against one target and a tail lash attack against another target.

At-Will

Immediate Reaction

Trigger: When an enemy misses the dragon with a melee attack, at-will

The dragon makes a tail lash attack against the triggering enemy.

Recharge 5-6 ✦ Acid

Standard

Close blast 5

+22 vs Fortitude; 2d10+5 acid damage, and the target is pushed 2 squares. The target also takes ongoing 5 acid damage and is immobilized (save ends both).

Encounter ✦ Acid

Free

Trigger: When first bloodied, encounter

The dragon's breath weapon recharges, and the dragon uses it immediately.

Encounter ✦ Fear

Standard

Close burst 5

Targets enemies; +21 vs Will; the target is stunned until the end of the dragon's next turn. Aftereffect: The target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls (save ends).

Recharge 6

Close burst 5

Targets immobilized enemies; +24 vs Fortitude; the target is petrified (save ends). Aftereffect: The target is immobilized (save ends). A creature that fails a saving throw against this immobilized condition becomes petrified again as if hit by the stone's embrace power, including this aftereffect.

Passive Perception 24 | Insight 24
